verbs.description: [ARG0: Russian operatives] [V: linked] [ARG1: a notorious “ troll factory ”] [ARGM-LOC: under indictment by special counsel Robert Mueller] [ARG2: for their interference in the 2016 election] [ARGM-PRP: to help Donald Trump become president] , were caught preparing to launch another influence operation to interfere in the 2018 U.S. midterm elections .
